Great question. It's very good that you are thinking about this. India with spirituality of course. Not only India, but any nation without spirituality is meaningless. Well if you think spirituality is following a certain religion or following a certain belief or say worshipping god then you are wrong. Spirituality is something more than that. We as humans are gifted to have some moral values or you can say certain virtues which make us more human. Spirituality adds a meaning to our life and the purpose of why we are living. Life is a precious gift to us with added consciousness being unique to humans. Spirituality means knowing ourselves and how our life add meaning to this world or maybe life of others living. A search for our connection with the universe. So just earning money or living your dream job doesn't make you satisfied at the end of the day. What matters is whether we have found the purpose of our life and have we done anything meaningful with it. Otherwise we are just like other creatures or robots and India is only a piece of land. Thank you
